languages.text: "Мы никогда не откажем в помощи то{mf|му|й}, кто щедро жертвует на нужды нашей миссии".

traits.locale_text: "Мы никогда не откажем в помощи тому, кто щедро жертвует на нужды нашей миссии".

languages.text: "We would never refuse our help to one who makes generous donations to our mission."
languages.original_text: "Мы никогда не откажем в помощи то{mf|му|й}, кто щедро жертвует на нужды нашей миссии".

traits.locale_text: "We would never refuse our help to one who makes generous donations to our mission."
"We would never refuse our help to one who makes generous donations to our mission."

languages.text: “我们绝不会拒绝为我们的事业慷慨解囊的人。”
languages.original_text: "We would never refuse our help to one who makes generous donations to our mission."

traits.locale_text: “我们绝不会拒绝为我们的事业慷慨解囊的人。”

languages.text: 「私たちの使命のために豊富な寄付をしてくださる方の援助を拒むなど決してない」
languages.original_text: "We would never refuse our help to one who makes generous donations to our mission."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちの使命のために豊富な寄付をしてくださる方の援助を拒むなど決してない」

languages.text: «Nunca nos negaríamos a ayudar a quien hace donaciones generosas a nuestra misión».
languages.original_text: "We would never refuse our help to one who makes generous donations to our mission."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca nos negaríamos a ayudar a quien hace donaciones generosas a nuestra misión».

languages.text: "Wir würden uns niemals weigern, jemandem zu helfen, der unserer Mission eine großzügige Spende zukommen lässt."
languages.original_text: "We would never refuse our help to one who makes generous donations to our mission."

traits.locale_text: "Wir würden uns niemals weigern, jemandem zu helfen, der unserer Mission eine großzügige Spende zukommen lässt."

languages.text: « Nous ne pouvons rien refuser à {mf|celui|celle} qui s'est montré aussi {mf|généreux|généreuse} envers notre mission. »
languages.original_text: "We would never refuse our help to one who makes generous donations to our mission."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne pouvons rien refuser à {mf|celui|celle} qui s'est montré aussi {mf|généreux|généreuse} envers notre mission. »

languages.text: "Misyonumuza cömert bağışlar yapanlara yardımcı olmaktan asla geri durmayız."
languages.original_text: "We would never refuse our help to one who makes generous donations to our mission."

traits.locale_text: "Misyonumuza cömert bağışlar yapanlara yardımcı olmaktan asla geri durmayız."
